the-quest-board.name: The Quest Board
the-quest-board.summary: The Quest Board is a website that allows artists to find commissions on reddit. This project is an experimentation with web-scraping using puppeteer inside of a Dockerized application.

minishell.name: minishell
minishell.summary: A robust shell implementation in C with bash-4.3 syntax.

ft_irc.name: ft_irc
ft_irc.summary: A fully fledged IRC Server built in C++98.
